item.title: R's Demise Higly Overblown
item.description: In this post I will provide evidence that contradicts recent reports that the R Programming language is declining in popularity. In last few months I have come across several blog posts that suggest that Python is reducing the demand for R. Yet, it contradicts what I am seeing in my day to day life. Many analyst at work from different parts of the business that are not associated with data science or software engineering are adopting the R programming language because it feels more comfortable than Python and they are not interested in building software or building production pipelines.
